description:
A Shimano® Deore front derailleur to complete a 3x10 drivetrain. Get ready for light shifting action and smooth, robust gear changes.

  • Middle-clamp front derailleur
  • Compatible 28.6, 31.8 and 34.9mm seat tubes
  • Chain guide is steel, base is aluminum
  • Side swing
  • For 3x10-speed systems
  • 50mm chain line
  • 40-42T top gear teeth, total capacity 18T
  • 66-69 chain stay angle
  • Front pull
name: Shimano Deore FD-M6000 10 Speed Front Derailleur
